output: Master the fundamentals of robotics, including hardware design, automation, and intelligent control systems.
Learn how to build and program robots for industries like healthcare, manufacturing, and space exploration.
Explore topics like sensor integration, robotic path planning, and machine learning for robots.
Understand how robotics intersects with AI, IoT, and cloud technologies to create smart systems.
Work on hands-on projects to develop autonomous robots capable of decision-making and real-time adaptations.
